video.title: Human Planet: Behind the Lens
video.synopsis: Documentarians do some adapting of their own when they're tasked with telling remarkable stories of human survival from all corners of Earth.

episodes.synopsis: The dive crew offers a behind-the-scenes look at daring Philippine compressor divers, who go deep to herd fish without benefit of air regulators.
episodes.title: Oceans - Into the Blue

episodes.synopsis: The crew presents the challenges of filming in the desert, from fighting the wind in a hot air balloon to keeping up with the quick moves of a camel.
episodes.title: Deserts - Life in the Furnace

episodes.synopsis: To shoot narwhal footage in the Arctic Circle, the crew travels to open ice via dog sled, then must film quickly before the ice melts beneath them.
episodes.title: Arctic - Life in the Deep Freeze

episodes.synopsis: Deep in the jungle of Papua, the crew visits the Korowai people and films them building a towering tree house strong enough to withstand the elements.
episodes.title: Jungles - People of the Trees

episodes.synopsis: In the vast Altai mountain region of Mongolia, the crew films Golden Eagle hunters, who help in their far-flung search for the rare Mongolian fox.
episodes.title: Mountains - Life in Thin Air

episodes.synopsis: In Kenya, the crew shoots footage of the Dorobo people trying to steal food from a pride of lions while dealing with dangers of filming hungry lions.
episodes.title: Grasslands - The Roots of Power

episodes.synopsis: To film Laotian fisherman Sam Niang's daring tightrope trek across raging cataracts, the crew attempts to construct a pulley system for the camera.
episodes.title: Rivers - Friend and Foe

episodes.synopsis: From deadly sulfur gas in Java to bee stings in Africa and sharks in the Arctic, the crew faces many dangers and challenges filming around the world.
episodes.title: Cities - Surviving the Urban Jungle
